• You may only host one event at a time. If you would like to create more than one event, ask a friend to help you out by signing up as the host and then listing you as a co-host in the Event Description.

• You may only host one event at a time. If you would like to create more than one event, ask a friend to help you out by signing up as the host and then listing you as a co-host in the Event Description.

• Vous ne pouvez héberger qu'un seul événement à la fois. Si vous désirez créer plus d'un événement, demandez à un ami de vous aider en se connectant en tant qu'hôte, puis en vous désignant comme co-hôte dans la description de l'événement.

• Du kannst nur jeweils einen Event hosten. Falls du mehr als einen Event erstellen möchtest, bitte einen Freund um Hilfe, damit dieser sich als Host anmeldet und dich anschließend als Co-Host in der Event-Beschreibung angibt.
• Solo puedes ser anfitrión de un evento cada vez. Si quieres crear más de uno, pídele ayuda a un amigo para que haga las veces de anfitrión y te inscriba como segundo anfitrión en la descripción.
• Puoi ospitare un solo evento per volta. Se desideri creare più di un evento, chiedi ad un amico di aiutarti iscrivendosi come host e quindi inserendoti come co-host nella descrizione dell'evento.
• 사용자는 한번에 하나의 이벤트만 주최할 수 있습니다. 하나 이상의 이벤트를 만들고 싶다면 친구에게 부탁해서 친구가 해당 이벤트를 호스트로 등록하고 이벤트 설명에서 사용자를 공동 호스트로 등재하도록 하십시오.

• You may only host one event at a time. If you would like to create more than one event, ask a friend to help you out by signing up as the host and then listing you as a co-host in the Event Description.
• 你只可同時舉辦一個活動。如你想建立超過一個活動，需拜託朋友登記為主辦人，然後在活動詳情裡將你列為合辦人。
• 你只可同時舉辦一個活動。如你想建立超過一個活動，需拜託朋友登記為主辦人，然後在活動詳情裡將你列為合辦人。
• You may delete your event at any time. But please try to not cancel events at the last minute.
• You may delete your event at any time. But please try to not cancel events at the last minute.
• Vous pouvez supprimer votre événement à tout moment, mais essayez de ne pas annuler des événements à la dernière minute.
• Du kannst deinen Event jederzeit löschen. Achte jedoch bitte darauf, Events nicht in letzter Minute abzusagen.
• Puedes borrar los eventos cuando quieras, pero intenta no cancelarlos a última hora.
• Puoi annullare l'evento quando desideri, ma cerca di non annullare l'evento all'ultimo minuto.
• 생성한 이벤트는 언제든지 삭제할 수 있습니다. 하지만 마지막 1분 동안에는 이벤트를 취소하지 마십시오.
• You may delete your event at any time. But please try to not cancel events at the last minute.
• 你可隨時刪除活動，但請不要最後一刻才取消活動。
• 你可隨時刪除活動，但請不要最後一刻才取消活動。
• You may only create your event a maximum of 7 days in advance, but you must create your event at least 1 day prior to start date. Proper planning will help you make sure your event is a success.
• You may only create your event a maximum of 7 days in advance, but you must create your event at least 1 day prior to start date. Proper planning will help you make sure your event is a success.

• Vous ne pouvez créer votre événement que 7 jours à l'avance au maximum, mais vous devez le créer au moins 1 jour avant sa date de début. Bien planifier un événement est essentiel pour son bon déroulement.
• Du kannst deinen Event höchstens sieben Tage im Voraus, mindestens jedoch einen Tag vor dem Anfangsdatum erstellen. Eine gute Planung trägt zum Erfolg deines Events bei.
• Puedes crear eventos con una antelación máxima de siete días y, por lo menos, un día antes de que dé comienzo. La buena planificación te ayudará a que sea un éxito.
• Puoi creare l'evento fino a 7 giorni in anticipo, ma come minimo 1 giorno prima della data d'inizio. Una pianificazione adeguata garantirà il successo del tuo evento.
• 이벤트는 시작일로부터 최대 7일, 최소 1일 전에 생성해야 합니다. 이벤트를 성공리에 진행할 수 있도록 계획을 잘 세우십시오.
• You may only create your event a maximum of 7 days in advance, but you must create your event at least 1 day prior to start date. Proper planning will help you make sure your event is a success.
• 你只可在最多7天前建立活動，但必須在開始日期前最少1天建立活動。良好的計畫能助你確保活動成功。
• 你只可在最多7天前建立活動，但必須在開始日期前最少1天建立活動。良好的計畫能助你確保活動成功。
• Events may be scheduled for a maximum of 2 hours. If you think your event will last longer than the allotted time, please make a note for your friends in the Event Description.
• Events may be scheduled for a maximum of 2 hours. If you think your event will last longer than the allotted time, please make a note for your friends in the Event Description.
• Les événements peuvent durer 2 heures au maximum. Si vous pensez que votre événement durera plus longtemps que cela, pensez à le spécifier pour vos amis dans la description de l'événement.

• Für Events werden normalerweise maximal zwei Stunden veranschlagt. Falls du glaubst, dass dein Event länger dauert als die zugewiesene Zeit, solltest du deine Freunde in der Event-Beschreibung darauf hinweisen.
• La duración de los eventos será de dos horas como máximo. Si crees que puede alargarse más allá del tiempo asignado, añade una nota para tus amigos en la descripción.
• Gli eventi possono essere pianificati per un massimo di 2 ore. Se ritieni che il tuo evento possa durare oltre il tempo assegnato, informa gli amici nella descrizione dell'evento.
• 이벤트는 최대 2시간 동안 일정을 등록할 수 있습니다. 이벤트가 할당 시간보다 더 오래 진행될 것 같다면 이벤트 설명란에 그 내용을 기록해서 친구들에게 알리십시오.
• Events may be scheduled for a maximum of 2 hours. If you think your event will last longer than the allotted time, please make a note for your friends in the Event Description.
• 你可設定活動為最長2小時。如你認為活動的時間會較已分配更長，請在活動詳情中註明。
• 你可設定活動為最長2小時。如你認為活動的時間會較已分配更長，請在活動詳情中註明。
• You can only host one event per 7 days. If you want to create more than one event within 7 days, you can ask your friends to help out by hosting an event for you.
• You can only host one event per 7 days. If you want to create more than one event within 7 days, you can ask your friends to help out by hosting an event for you.

• Vous ne pouvez héberger qu'un seul événement tous les 7 jours. Si vous désirez créer plus d'un événement en 7 jours, vous pouvez demander à vos amis de vous aider en hébergeant un événement pour vous.
• Du kannst nur einen Event in sieben Tagen ausrichten. Falls du innerhalb von sieben Tagen mehr als einen Event erstellen möchtest, kannst du deine Freunde bitten, einen Event für dich auszurichten.
• Puedes ser anfitrión de un evento cada siete días. Si deseas crear más eventos dentro de ese plazo, pídele ayuda a tus amigos para que hagan ellos de anfitriones.
• Puoi ospitare un solo evento per 7 giorni. Se vuoi creare più di un evento nell'arco di 7 giorni, puoi chiedere ai tuoi amici di aiutarti ospitando un evento per conto tuo.
• 7일마다 1개의 이벤트만 주최할 수 있습니다. 7일 동안 1개 이상의 이벤트를 생성하고 싶다면 친구에게 부탁해서 이벤트를 대신 주최해달라고 부탁하십시오.
• You can only host one event per 7 days. If you want to create more than one event within 7 days, you can ask your friends to help out by hosting an event for you.
• 你只可在7天內主辦一個活動，如你想主辦更多，可請好友幫你主辦活動。
• 你只可在7天內主辦一個活動，如你想主辦更多，可請好友幫你主辦活動。
• You cannot edit an event within 24 hours of it's start time.
• You cannot edit an event within 24 hours of it's start time.
• Vous ne pouvez pas modifier un événement dans les 24 heures précédant sa date de début.
• Du kannst einen Event bis zu 24 Stunden vor seiner Anfangszeit bearbeiten.
• No podrás editar los eventos en las 24 horas inmediatamente anteriores a su inicio.
• Non puoi modificare un evento nelle 24 ore prima del suo inizio.
• 이벤트 시작일로부터 24시간 이내에는 이벤트를 수정할 수 없습니다.
• You cannot edit an event within 24 hours of it's start time.
• 你不能在活動的開始時間後24小時內編輯活動。
• 你不能在活動的開始時間後24小時內編輯活動。
• If you've deleted an event, you must exit the space and return before creating a new event.
• If you've deleted an event, you must exit the space and return before creating a new event.
• Si vous avez supprimé un événement, vous devez quitter l'espace et y retourner avant de pouvoir créer un nouvel événement.
• Falls du einen Event gelöscht hast, musst du den Bereich verlassen und erneut betreten, bevor du einen neuen erstellen kannst.
• Si has borrado un evento, deberás salir del espacio y volver a entrar en él para poder crear otro.
• Se hai cancellato un evento, devi uscire dallo spazio e rientrare prima di creare un nuovo evento.
• 이벤트를 삭제한 후에는 해당 공간에서 나와서 돌아가야만 새로운 이벤트를 생성할 수 있습니다.
• If you've deleted an event, you must exit the space and return before creating a new event.
• 如你刪除了活動，必須離開空間，然後再回來，才能建立新的活動。
• 如你刪除了活動，必須離開空間，然後再回來，才能建立新的活動。

• Set the stage: Host events in appropriate locations.

• Keep the invitation open. Use events as an opportunity to meet new friends.
• Keep the invitation open. Use events as an opportunity to meet new friends.
• Ouvrez vos portes. Profitez de vos événements pour rencontrer de nouveaux amis.
• Beschränke die Teilnahme für deine Events nicht. Nutze sie als Chance, um neue Freunde zu treffen.
• Abre las puertas: usa los eventos como una ocasión de hacer nuevos amigos.
• Tieni gli inviti aperti. Pensa agli eventi come a un'occasione per fare nuove amicizie.
• 초대 여부를 공개로 하십시오. 이벤트를 통해서 새로운 친구를 만나는 기회를 얻으십시오.
• Keep the invitation open. Use events as an opportunity to meet new friends.
• 保持公開邀請，將活動用作認識新朋友的機會。

• Be yourself! Don't impersonate others when hosting events.
• Be yourself! Don't impersonate others when hosting events.
• Soyez vous-même ! Ne vous faites pas passer pour quelqu'un d'autre quand vous hébergez des événements.
• Sei du selbst! Gib dich nicht als jemand anderes aus, wenn du Events ausrichtest.
• ¡Sé tú mismo! No representes un papel cuando celebres un evento.
• Sii te stesso! Non impersonare altri quando ospiti eventi.

• Be yourself! Don't impersonate others when hosting events.
• 做回自己！舉辦活動時，不要模仿別人。
• 做回自己！舉辦活動時，不要模仿別人。

• Keep a consistent schedule for recurring events.
• Tenez un planning régulier pour les événements récurrents.

• Mantén un horario regular en los eventos que se repitan.
• Programma gli eventi ricorrenti in maniera regolare.
